r.s: Determine and list how much filespace each installed package consumes.
r.d: A commandline tool modeled on 'df' that lists how much filespace each installed package consumes. A subset of packages can be specified as can channels.
r.n: * bug fix: #13549 - all PEAR roles are supported (including 'ext' and 'src') * request: #13441 - console/text output is neater * request: #13442 - channel summary * request: #13527 - CSV output * request: #13550 - XML output * request: #13572 - move cli processing intelligence from PEAR_Size to separate class * request: #13573 - integration with pear command
